name: Chao's reading list
body:
### Reading List

### 专业书籍
[Principles of Uncertainty](http://www.amazon.com/Principles-Uncertainty-Chapman-Statistical-Science/dp/1439861617), Joseph B. Kadane, Chapman and Hall/CRC, 2011.

### 非专业书籍
[魔鬼数学](http://product.china-pub.com/4731411)\([How note to be wrong](http://www.amazon.com/How-Not-Be-Wrong-Mathematical/dp/1594205221), Jordan Ellenberg, Penguin Press, 2014\)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
